description: Cross-Sectional Study Aimed at validating a new taxonomy of Neurodegenerative Diseases | Organising Knowledge about Neurodegenerative Disease Mechanisms for the Improvement of Drug Development and Therapy | Final AETIONOMY Symposium on Neurodegeneration and General Assembly | The Final AETIONOMY Symposium on Neurodegenerative Research of Dementia, Alzheimer's and Parkinson's Disease and General Assembly took place on November 29 and 30, 2018 at the Congresshotel Collegium Leoninum, Bonn, Germany
name: AETIONOMY
